name: OneShot - Original
description:
OneShot is a puzzle and adventure indie game developed by Little Cat Feet and published by Degica.
The game started as freeware; this version was made in a month, and released online on June 30, 2014 by creators Eliza Velasquez and Casey Gu. It was developed as an entry for RPGMakerWeb's 2014 Indie Game Maker Contest, but did not receive any accolades.
